name: Retrieve the Summary Informaction for a customer having not logged in

testSteps.description: Given I have not logged into the API
And I have not located a customer

When I retrieve the Customer Demographics Summary information for customer
| cifKey |
| 0100000935210553000 |
Then I should receive an Authorisation Error

userStory.storyName: API to allow the retieval of the Customer Name and other information in a more usuable foramt for the front end
